attributes.action: Celebrate LGBT sportspeople by dedicating the British 2021 World Cup to them.
attributes.background: With recent survey results showing high acceptance of LGBT players amongst fans, contrasting with continued racist incidents, this is a great occasion to make a public celebration  of inclusiveness and diversity, as well as good sportsmanship, all values strongly held by the British public.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the Rugby League International Federation, not the Government or Parliament.
